# [Interview #250: Robert Jordan's Blog: I'M BAAAA-AAACK, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=250#13)

#### Robert Jordan

Well, take care, guys. The tour was fun, but it's good to be back home. It's good to be alive. It's good to back at my desk, writing.

Bye for now.

RJ
